Holiday.name: Holiday
Holiday.description: Represents a period during which a service resource is unavailable for appointment scheduling. Recurring holidays are not supported in Automotive Cloud.

EndTimeInMinutes.description: The end time of the holiday in minutes.

IsAllDay.description: Indicates whether the duration of the holiday is all day (true) or not (false).

StartTimeInMinutes.description: The start time of the holiday in minutes.
